result.title: Digital Training Handbook
result.description: An open access tool for optimization to enhance cyberresilience in finance sector It will integrate conclusions from WP2 and WP5 to identify core areas of cybersecurity in finance The Digital Training Handbook will be conceived so it can be adapted to include future threats policies and other relevant cybersecurity related elements

result.title: Standardized system to security incidences handling and monitoring
result.description: Mapping and evaluatiob of current standardisation work in cybersecurity with a focus on standards development The work will consider existing standards standards currently under development eg CWAs and standards under discussion or planned new work items The review will also include academic policy and grey literature as well as review deliverables from European projects in this field

result.title: Plan for operation and maintenance
result.description: The task will develop and implement a plan for the operation and maintenance of the services to be produced during the projects lifetime It aims to ensure that the services are compliant with the H2020 Open Access policy and the recommendations of the Open Research Data pilot In this context the task will be responsible for the development of the projects Data Management Plan DMP that will outline how research data will be processed or generated within the project what methodology and standards will be adopted whether and how this data will be shared andor made open and how this data will be curated and preserved during and after the project The task will ensure effective implementation of the enduser services and will control its performance in an efficient manner such that economical sustainable and reliable operation is optimized This will contribute to optimum performance and reliability of the system through translating the user requirements and recommendations into specific guidelines that can be applied in the users practices
